articles.author: Jordan Blackwell
articles.title: James Justin 'upset' and Leicester City players 'gutted' with injury diagnosis due - Leicestershire Live
articles.description: The full-back was stretchered off during the 3-0 win over Newport, likely ending his hopes of a World Cup call-up, with Brendan Rodgers to give further details on Thursday
articles.content:
James Justin was left "upset" by the injury he suffered on Tuesday night as Leicester City wait to discover the extent of the issue.
